hero.title: Intelligent Datacenter
hero.subtitle: Operations Management
hero.description: Monitor, manage, and optimize your datacenter operations in real-time. Get instant alerts, detailed analytics, and complete control over your infrastructure.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your datacenter

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor temperature, humidity, and power consumption in real-time. Get instant alerts when parameters exceed thresholds.

power.title: Power Management
power.description: Track power consumption, manage load distribution, and optimize energy usage across your datacenter infrastructure.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.description: Get detailed insights into your datacenter operations with comprehensive analytics and customizable reports.

rack.title: Rack Management
rack.description: Efficiently manage your rack infrastructure with detailed views of capacity, usage, and environmental conditions.

stats.title: Trusted by datacenter operators worldwide
stats.subtitle: Delivering reliability, security, and efficiency to your operations
